channel.title: Pages on breadchris
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on breadchris

item.title: I hacked your site
item.description: It isn’t your fault, you were just doing your job. Even if you wanted to try to stop it, there isn’t much you, as an individual, could do about it. Either I or someone else who vaguely understands how to code was going to hack you like this. Business requirements for shipping that feature out at lighting speed for your largest customer last quarter made this all too easy. const asdf = () => {} Your company’s site uses javascript.

item.title: Information About Gloving
item.description: Since the EmazingLights site seems to be down. I have moved the information over here to keep it alive! Start Gloving Welcome to the Learn Gloving Center, the most extensive online resource out there for learning everything you need to know about gloving. Constantly being updated and contributed to by the worldâ€™s most knowledgeable glovers, this is your first and best resource for learning what you need to jump into the world of gloving.

item.title: NYU Dropped the Ball
item.description: How it went wrong I have a pretty bad taste in my mouth with NYU after what they have done with CSAW over time. The fact that HSF became a CTF, quality went downhill, and then now non-existent is something that really bothers me. It had felt to me that there was a complete disregard for the exceptional talent pipeline that Nasir/Poly had established for continuing to build out cyber security at NYU.
